name: Harry Potter
desc: Main character of the Harry Potter series.

name: Ron Weasly
desc: Harry Potter's best friend, known for his large family and hair color.

name: Hermione Granger
desc: One of Harry Potter's best friends known for her academics and knowledge.

name: Albus Dumbledore
desc: Headmaster of Hogwarts and holder of the Elder Wand. Becomes Harry's mentor throughout the books.
wand: 15 inch, Elder, Thestral tail hair core[

name: Neville Longbottom
desc: Friend of Harry Potter who is very clumsy and has an overprotective grandmother.

name: Luna Lovegood
desc: Odd friend of Harry Potter who saw her mother die, lives with her eccentric dad.

name: Minerva McGonagall
desc: Transfiguration teacher at Hogwarts, has the animagus of a cat

name: Percy Weasley
desc: The Gryffindor prefect in Harry's early years.

name: Fred Weasley
desc: Older brother of Ron, known for his hilarity and magic joke shop owned with his brother, George.

name: George Weasley
desc: Twin Brother of Fred Weasley also known for his jokes and hyjinks.

name: Rubues Hagrid
desc: The groundskeeper and close friend of Harry Potter, expelled from Hogwarts in his 3rd year.

name: Ginny Weasley
desc: Youngest and only sister in the Weasley household, becomes romantically involved with Harry in his 6th year.

name: Serverus Snape
desc: Potions teacher at Hogwarts, known for hating Harry because his dad saved his life.

name: Lily Potter
desc: Mother of Harry Potter, known for protecting Harry with her love.

name: James Potter
desc: Father of Harry Potter, 1/4 of the muaraders and has an animangus of a stag.

name: Sirius Black
desc: Godfather of Harry Potter, was Harry's father figure.

name: Remus Lupin
desc: Defense Against The Dark Arts teacher for one year, known for being a muarader and a werewolf.

name: Draco Malfoy
desc: The arch-nemises of Harry Potter, known for his Death-Eater father and former house-elf, Dobby.

name: Lucius Malfoy
desc: Father of Draco Malfoy, known for being a Death-Eater.

name: Cedric Diggory
desc: Participant in the Triwizard Tournament, is killed before the resurrection of Voldemort.

name: Tom Riddle
desc: Dark Lord who tried to kill Harry Potter as a baby

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
desc: A loyal death eater and killer of Sirius Black. Carved 'mudblood' into Hermione's arm.
